name: Math Wizards
subject: Mathematics
description: A group for students who want to master calculus, algebra, and more. Weekly problem-solving sessions and exam prep.

name: Code Masters
subject: Computer Science
description: Collaborate on coding projects, prepare for hackathons, and help each other with assignments.

name: Bio Study Buddies
subject: Biology
description: Discuss concepts, share notes, and prepare for practicals and theory exams together.

name: Business Brains
subject: Business Administration
description: Case study discussions, group presentations, and exam strategies for business students.
